entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
